review: Bought one locally on sale for same price as here. Always thought the concept sucked, but picked one up for screen casting, as this was the cheapest of any kind of box where reviews said delay was low enough for gaming. It is much more than a screen caster. I found with Bubble UPnP, I can render all content on my network with on the fly transcoding. Offloading videos from apps like Netflix is a snap too. As is playing radio and locally stored music. Forget the Chrome workaround. Bubble UPnP was well worth the $5 before I had a Chromecast, but now idespensible as it integrates very well with the Chromecast, making local, cloud stored, and network content a breeze to stream. I was wrong about the concept sucking and am glad I discovered this by buying it as a dumb box for screen casting. It has given me much more than that.
